$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external.title: $:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image
$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external.creator: LinOnetwo
$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external.text:
<!--

This template is used to assign the ''_canonical_uri'' field to external images.

Change the `./images/` part to a different base URI. The URI can be relative or absolute.

-->
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/{{$:/GitHub/Repo}}/master/{{$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name}}/<$view field="title" format="urlencoded"/>

$:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-ima.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-image/canonical-uri-external-image
$:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-ima.creator: LinOnetwo
$:/plugins/linonetwo/github-external-ima.text:
!! Usage

Please fill in [[$:/GitHub/Repo]] and [[$:/config/linonetwo/github-external-image/tiddler-folder-name]] to get started.

Then, on build, all images will be replaced by place holders.

Please use following build target:

```json
"externalimages": [
  "--setfield",
  "[is[binary]] [type[application/msword]]",
  "_canonical_uri",
  "$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image",
  "text/plain",
  "--setfield",
  "[is[binary]] [type[application/msword]]",
  "text",
  "$:/core/templates/canonical-uri-external-image",
  "text/plain",
  "--rendertiddler",
  "$:/core/save/all",
  "index.html",
  "text/plain"
],
```
